John Palumbo

  • 201-896-4100 #7070
  • jpalumbo@sh-law.com
  • Connect on LinkedIn
  • Download Contact

Biography

John Palumbo has played an integral role in the management of day-to-day functions at Scarinci Hollenbeck for 25 years. As Director of Business Administration, Mr. Palumbo is responsible for ensuring that the office is operationally efficient and effective.  His responsibilities include management of the Records Department and the Billing Department, as well as oversight of the facilities of all of the firm’s offices. This includes managing construction projects, relocation, storage, and coordinating logistics with the Information Technology (IT) department.

Mr. Palumbo is also the firm’s risk manager who handles handle the insurance policies for professional liability insurance.
